entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS AROUND 90

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
